sentences.sContent: The fact that the plane was late added a further complication to our journey.
sentences.sCn: 飞机误点给我们的旅行带来了更大的麻烦。

sentences.sContent: Pneumonia is one of the common complications faced by bed-ridden patients.
sentences.sCn: 肺炎是卧床病人所面临的常见并发症之一。

synos.tran: 并发症；复杂；复杂化；混乱

remMethod.val: com ＋ plic(重叠) ＋ ation → 重叠出现的病症 → 并发症

words.tran: 使复杂化；使恶化；使卷入

trans.tranOther: a problem or situation that makes something more difficult to understand or deal with
